akn:section.akn:heading: Change in name of Perry’s Victory and International Peace Memorial National Monument

akn:content.akn:p: § 433f–1. Change in name of Perry’s Victory and International Peace Memorial National Monument The Perry’s Victory and International Peace Memorial National Monument, established in accordance with section 433a of this title, is redesignated the Perry’s Victory and International Peace Memorial. (Pub. L. 92–568, § 1, Oct. 26, 1972, 86 Stat. 1181.)
